Description: Saudi Ground Services Co (known as: SGS) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2015. SGS operates within the Transportation sector focusing on Airport Services. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Diversified Support Services and Airport Services. SGS is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 2008.

Shareholder Name: National Aviation Ground Support Co Ltd
